mapper.update:
UPDATE product
product_serial_number = #{productSerialNumber},
product_category = #{productCategory},
brand_id = #{brandId},
category_tree_node_id = #{categoryTreeNodeId},
title = #{title},
name = #{name},
chinese_name = #{chineseName},
market_price = #{marketPrice},
tax_no = #{taxNo},
ean_no = #{eanNo},
referlink = #{referlink},
extend = #{extend},
place_of_origin = #{placeOfOrigin},
calculation_unit = #{calculationUnit},
status = #{status},
is_available = #{isAvailable},
product_details = #{productDetails},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
price_detail = #{priceDetail},
commodity_template_id = #{commodityTemplateId},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update product set referlink =null where id = #{id}
delete from product where name is null
mapper.insert:
